 17 /**
 18  * Creates a textured quad object.
 19  *
 20  * @class An abstraction for textured quads. Used in the
 21  * {@link bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuadScene}.
 22  *
 23  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} p the top-left corner of the quad
 24  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} u vector pointing from p along the top edge of the quad
 25  * @param {bigshot.Point3D} v vector pointing from p along the left edge of the quad
 26  * @param {WebGLTexture} the texture to use.
 27  */
 28 bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuad = function (p, u, v, texture) {
 29     this.p = p;
 30     this.u = u;
 31     this.v = v;
 32     this.texture = texture;
 33 }
 34 
 35 bigshot.WebGLTexturedQuad.prototype = {
 36     
 37     /**
 38      * Renders the quad using the given {@link bigshot.WebGL} instance.
 39      * Currently creates, fills, draws with and then deletes three buffers -
 40      * not very efficient, but works.
 41      *
 42      * @param {bigshot.WebGL} webGl the WebGL wrapper instance to use for rendering.
 43      */
 44     render : function (webGl, vertexPositionBuffer, textureCoordBuffer, vertexIndexBuffer) {
 45         webGl.gl.bindBuffer(webGl.gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexPositionBuffer);
 46         var vertices = [
 47             this.p.x, this.p.y,  this.p.z,
 48             this.p.x + this.u.x, this.p.y + this.u.y,  this.p.z + this.u.z,
 49             this.p.x + this.u.x + this.v.x, this.p.y + this.u.y + this.v.y,  this.p.z + this.u.z + this.v.z,
 50             this.p.x + this.v.x, this.p.y + this.v.y,  this.p.z + this.v.z
 51         ];
 52         webGl.gl.bufferData(webGl.gl.ARRAY_BUFFER, new Float32Array (vertices), webGl.gl.STATIC_DRAW);
 53         
 54         webGl.gl.activeTexture(webGl.gl.TEXTURE0);
 55         webGl.gl.bindTexture(webGl.gl.TEXTURE_2D, this.texture);
 56         webGl.gl.uniform1i(webGl.shaderProgram.samplerUniform, 0);
 57         
 58         webGl.gl.bindBuffer(webGl.gl.ELEMENT_ARRAY_BUFFER, vertexIndexBuffer);
 59         webGl.gl.drawElements(webGl.gl.TRIANGLES, 6, webGl.gl.UNSIGNED_SHORT, 0);
 60         
 61         webGl.gl.bindTexture(webGl.gl.TEXTURE_2D, null);
 62     }
 63 }
